title: X LIST: "10 YEARS"
body_text:
In less than one short week,
ECD
will reach - and I can't believe I'm saying this - "A Decade of Dodgeball." That's truly incredible, it really is.
So if you're strangely thinking of skipping this mega-milestone, here are
the ten reasons
why that would ultimately be a regrettable mistake ▬
________________________________________
______________________________
TEN ▬ "August Heaven"
It's no secret that the most acclaimed battles and grandest stages have occurred within this crucial 31-day time frame. Need a few examples? I thought you might!
- the monstrous do-or-die war at
ECD 174
, Tronolone & C. Adams v. Megill & K. Adams;
-
ECD 151
, featuring the feud-concluding confrontation pitting Cornero against Letsche;
- the epic "Star Wars" encounter at
ECD 184
: Edwards, L. Winston, C. Adams vs. Fitzpatrick, V. Winston, Pierce
- and yes 50, 100, 150, and 200 all in August
And by the way, August claims the highest attendance average by a wide margin: 30.6 participants per event, all-time.
Insane!
NINE ▬ "Internal Calendar"
The harsh reality of growing older is
feeling older
. I was a 20-year young Monmouth U college student in 2005; I'll be 31 this September. My right shoulder isn't what it used to be, but that's life, right?! Enjoy the physicality - and the journey - while you still can.
EIGHT ▬ "Paper Calendar"
Behind-the-scenes, that good ol' Writer - that's me - documents and arranges an endless supply of numbers. And trust there have been plenty of created "10s" over the years .. except this one of course. We flipped our calendars in 2006 and 2008, successfully passed through '10, '11, and '12, and inevitably spilled into 2015. It's all out of our control and for that very reason,
ECD:10
is truly a one-time-only celebration.
SEVEN ▬ "Added Extras"
A kick-ass soundtrack, colorful decorations, and some hanging ornaments .. wait, what .. ? Listen to the fitting theme song
HERE
!
SIX ▬ "Rimshot Queen"
Devoted, dedicated, and supportive accurately describe Hall of Fame combatant, Lauren Stopa. Let's see how we all match up against the royal one herself in a special attraction Rimshot Contest. We're squeezing in a twist this time around, and it won't be a lemon!
FIVE ▬ "Triple Alliance"
During the "X List" series of Top Tens, did you notice a trend?
Every
3-v-3 match-up - yep, all seven - deservedly earned a coveted spot on the "Greatest Matches" list. In fact, the inaugural at the massive
ECD 100
claimed the top position, with its successors filling in the remaining slots. Check it out if you don't believe me at
"X List: Matches"
!
FOUR ▬ "Main Event"
Megill, Wolf, Pierce
versus
Edwards, Londono, T. Adams
:
ECDElite
Hall of Famers who have never partnered together wage war this final time.
THREE ▬ "The Stakes"
What's on the line is absolutely immeasurable. Three reignited rivalries, evidently unfinished: Can Megill finally defeat his only unbeaten adversary, Edwards? Will "The Punter" gain a measure of revenge on the "Muffin Man" after an agonizing wait? In their long-awaited sophomore attempt, who will prevail in the epic Pierce-Adams collision? Don't forget about the two unbeaten streaks and a golden opportunity at the captaincy "triple crown". The
stellar match preview
has all the details.
TWO ▬ "Class Reunion"
"It's kind of like graduating: who knows if you'll ever see some of these people again." Chilling, powerful words during the opening rush of the second centennial two Augusts ago.
ONE ▬ "Thank You"
Give yourself the night off from the wonders of worry and join the friendship-forming, marriage-creating, memory-making game of dodgeball. We all created and preserved this - you owe it to yourselves.
See you on August 22 at 5:45pm!
body_html:
In less than one short week, ECD will reach - and I can't believe I'm saying this - "A Decade of Dodgeball." That's truly incredible, it really is.

So if you're strangely thinking of skipping this mega-milestone, here are the ten reasons why that would ultimately be a regrettable mistake ▬

______________________________________________________________________

TEN ▬ "August Heaven"
It's no secret that the most acclaimed battles and grandest stages have occurred within this crucial 31-day time frame. Need a few examples? I thought you might!
- the monstrous do-or-die war at ECD 174, Tronolone & C. Adams v. Megill & K. Adams;
- ECD 151, featuring the feud-concluding confrontation pitting Cornero against Letsche;
- the epic "Star Wars" encounter at ECD 184: Edwards, L. Winston, C. Adams vs. Fitzpatrick, V. Winston, Pierce
- and yes 50, 100, 150, and 200 all in August
And by the way, August claims the highest attendance average by a wide margin: 30.6 participants per event, all-time. Insane!

NINE ▬ "Internal Calendar"
The harsh reality of growing older is feeling older. I was a 20-year young Monmouth U college student in 2005; I'll be 31 this September. My right shoulder isn't what it used to be, but that's life, right?! Enjoy the physicality - and the journey - while you still can.

EIGHT ▬ "Paper Calendar"
Behind-the-scenes, that good ol' Writer - that's me - documents and arranges an endless supply of numbers. And trust there have been plenty of created "10s" over the years .. except this one of course. We flipped our calendars in 2006 and 2008, successfully passed through '10, '11, and '12, and inevitably spilled into 2015. It's all out of our control and for that very reason, ECD:10 is truly a one-time-only celebration.

SEVEN ▬ "Added Extras"
A kick-ass soundtrack, colorful decorations, and some hanging ornaments .. wait, what .. ? Listen to the fitting theme song HERE!

SIX ▬ "Rimshot Queen"
Devoted, dedicated, and supportive accurately describe Hall of Fame combatant, Lauren Stopa. Let's see how we all match up against the royal one herself in a special attraction Rimshot Contest. We're squeezing in a twist this time around, and it won't be a lemon!

FIVE ▬ "Triple Alliance"
During the "X List" series of Top Tens, did you notice a trend? Every 3-v-3 match-up - yep, all seven - deservedly earned a coveted spot on the "Greatest Matches" list. In fact, the inaugural at the massive ECD 100 claimed the top position, with its successors filling in the remaining slots. Check it out if you don't believe me at "X List: Matches"!

FOUR ▬ "Main Event"
Megill, Wolf, Pierce versus Edwards, Londono, T. Adams: ECDElite Hall of Famers who have never partnered together wage war this final time.

THREE ▬ "The Stakes"
What's on the line is absolutely immeasurable. Three reignited rivalries, evidently unfinished: Can Megill finally defeat his only unbeaten adversary, Edwards? Will "The Punter" gain a measure of revenge on the "Muffin Man" after an agonizing wait? In their long-awaited sophomore attempt, who will prevail in the epic Pierce-Adams collision? Don't forget about the two unbeaten streaks and a golden opportunity at the captaincy "triple crown". The stellar match preview has all the details.

TWO ▬ "Class Reunion"
"It's kind of like graduating: who knows if you'll ever see some of these people again." Chilling, powerful words during the opening rush of the second centennial two Augusts ago.

ONE ▬ "Thank You"
Give yourself the night off from the wonders of worry and join the friendship-forming, marriage-creating, memory-making game of dodgeball. We all created and preserved this - you owe it to yourselves. See you on August 22 at 5:45pm!
